name: leetcodejs
description: Personal solution for leetcode problem using Javascript

scripts.gen-toc: node Tools/toc-gen/index.js && git add Problems.md && git add Easy/README.md && git add Medium/README.md
scripts.prepare: cd Tools/toc-gen && npm install && cd .. && cd scaffer && npm install
